meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 877 East 1200 South in Orem, Utah, as the “Jerry C. Washburn Post Office Building”.

main.name: HR887

content.p: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 877 East 1200 South in Orem, Utah, as the “Jerry C. Washburn Post Office Building”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Jerry C. Washburn Post Office Building.

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 877 East 1200 South in Orem, Utah, shall be known and designated as the “Jerry C. Washburn Post Office Building”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the “Jerry C. Washburn Post Office Building”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
